description: Led projects on human gesture recognition and foot traffic analysis, demonstrating skills in data analysis and sensor integration.
Published papers presented at conferences, showcasing research, documentation, and communication abilities.
Gained hands-on experience with technologies like Kinect and Oculus Rift, highlighting expertise in system integration and automation.
Contributed to the relaunch of the Mobi student organization focused on mobile development, winning hackathons and building applications like the UTA radio app.
Completed foundational coursework in mathematics, physics, and computer science in preparation for transfer to a four-year engineering program.
Participated in various engineering and technology clubs, developing early skills in programming and system design.
